sen.j: 舞鶴ふるるファーム（まいづる ふるる ファーム）は、京都府舞鶴市瀬崎にある農業公園。
sen.e: Maizuru Fururu Farm is an agricultural park located in Sezaki, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Maizuru Fururu Farm is an agricultural park located in Sezaki, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Maizuru Fururu Farm is an agricultural park located in Sezaki, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 2006年（平成18年）7月22日に舞鶴市中心部から北にある大浦半島の一角に開園した。
sen.e: It was opened at a part of Oura-hanto Peninsula north to the center of Maizuru City on July 22, 2006.
It was opened on a part of the Oura-hanto Peninsula north to the center of Maizuru City on July 22, 2006.
It was opened on a part of the Oura-hanto Peninsula north to the center of Maizuru City on July 22, 2006.

sen.j: 山の中にありながら海が望める公園として絶景である。
sen.e: Located in the mountain of the peninsula, it is a scenic spot that overlooks the sea.
Located in the mountains of the peninsula, it is a scenic spot that overlooks the sea.
Located in the mountains of the peninsula, it is a scenic spot that overlooks the sea.

sen.j: 晴れた日には冠島がくっきりと見ることができる。
sen.e: One can see Kanmurijima island from this park on a clear day.
One can see Kanmurijima island from this park on a clear day.
One can see Kanmuri-jima Island from this park on a clear day.

sen.j: 安心・安全の地元産農産物をできる限り使用した60種類以上の自然食メニューのビュッフェスタイルのレストラン、加工体験、自然学習体験などができる手づくり工房、ファーマーズマーケット、立体多段式水耕栽培システムを導入して、車椅子の人も利用できるいちごハウス、17区画の滞在型市民農園（クラインガルテン）、21区画の日帰り農園、2棟のコテージ等の施設がある。
sen.e: It houses the following facilities: a buffet restaurant of more than sixty kinds of natural food most of which are safe local produce; a handicraft workshop where one can experience working natural materials, and learning the natural environment; a farmer's market; a strawberry greenhouse with the vertically arranged multi-layered hydroponic system which is available to a person in a wheelchair; allotment gardens (Kleingarten) with seventeen land parcels for staying users; allotment gardens of twenty-one parcels for single-day users; and two cottages.

It houses the following facilities: a buffet restaurant of more than sixty kinds of natural food most of which are safe local produce; a handicraft workshop where one can experience working natural materials, and learning about the natural environment; a farmer's market; a strawberry greenhouse with the vertically arranged multi-layered hydroponic system which is available to a person in a wheelchair; allotment gardens (Kleingarten) with seventeen land parcels for staying users; allotment gardens of twenty-one parcels for single-day users; and two cottages.

It houses the following facilities: A buffet restaurant of more than sixty kinds of natural food most of which are safe local produce; a handicraft workshop where one can experience working natural materials, and learning about the natural environment; a farmer's market; a strawberry greenhouse with the vertically arranged multi-layered hydroponic system which is available to a person in a wheelchair; allotment gardens (also referred as Klein Garten, in German meaning small garden) with seventeen land parcels for staying users; allotment gardens of twenty-one parcels for single-day users; and two cottages.
sen.cmt: 半角にするなど、表記を変えました。

sen.j: 運営は指定管理者の株式会社農業法人ふるるが行う。
sen.e: It is operated by Fururufarm Inc. which is designated to manage the farm.
sen.cmt: 株式会社農業法人ふるる→Fururufarm Inc.[定訳不明]
sen.e: It is operated by Fururufarm Inc. which was designated to manage the farm.
It is operated by Fururufarm Inc. which was designated to manage the farm.

sen.e: Farm Restaurant Fururu: open 11:00 to 15:00 for weekdays; 11:00 to 15:00, and 18:00 to 22:00 for Friday, Saturday and Sunday

sen.e: It is approximately a twenty-minute drive from Maizuru Higashi Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway.
It is approximately a twenty-minute drive from Maizuru Higashi Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway.
It is approximately a twenty-minute by car for Oura-hanto Peninsula from Maizuru Higashi Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway.
